SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT CLASS_ID , CLASS_PCKAGE , CLASS_TY , CLASS_NM , CLASS_DC FROM OE1TNCLASS WHERE 1=1
CLASS_PCKAGE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
CLASS_TY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
CLASS_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
ORDER BY LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM DESC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNCLASS WHERE 1=1
CLASS_PCKAGE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
CLASS_TY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
CLASS_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT A.CLASS_PCKAGE , A.CLASS_ID , A.CLASS_DC , A.CLASS_NM , A.CLASS_TY , B.METHD_ANNOT , B.METHD_CODE , B.METHD_DC , B.METHD_ID , B.METHOD_NM , B.METHD_TY FROM OE1TNCLASS A LEFT JOIN OE1TNMETHD B ON A.CLASS_ID = B.CLASS_ID WHERE 1=1
A.CLASS_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.METHOD_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.METHD_ANNOT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
AND (B.METHD_ANNOT IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY B.LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM DESC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNCLASS A LEFT JOIN OE1TNMETHD B ON A.CLASS_ID = B.CLASS_ID WHERE 1=1
A.CLASS_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.METHOD_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.METHD_ANNOT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
AND (B.METHD_ANNOT IS NOT NULL)
